# Mechanical Inspection and Maintenance of Heavy Vehicles

In order to ensure that heavy vehicles are in good mechanical condition, the SAAQ administers regulations and programs that allow for interventions in several areas.

#### Buses and minibuses

Owners, operators and drivers of buses and minibuses must also comply with the requirements concerning vehicle maintenance and making sure they are in good condition, as these vehicles are considered heavy vehicles.

Last update: May 17, 2022
